html:
Jan 8 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including EDPR, Naturgy and Solaria, on Friday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* EDPR EDPR.LS: Exane BNP Paribas cuts to neutral from outperform

* Energean Plc ENOG.L: RBC raises to outperform from sector perform

* Naturgy NTGY.MC: Exane BNP Paribas raises to neutral from underperform

* RWE AG RWEG.DE: Exane BNP Paribas raises to outperform from neutral

* Solaria SLRS.MC: Goldman Sachs cuts to neutral from buy
